title: Can't access account on website
body: Hello, I cannot login to my main account (username -snip-and ingame name Mas√≥n). I get an error message on the league client stating the account is "transferring" and I can't even login to post a support ticket because when I try to login on the website I get an error message stating "this combination of username password and region doesn't match." I did forgot password and forgot username, and the email is still my email so I didn't get hacked. Please help, I have no idea what is going on. This came after a support ticket I sent in regarding the account, I don't know if that has anything to do with it.

replies.body: I've edited out your username for privacy reasons.  Don't worry, we can help!  As you mentioned with the ticket you sent, a security lock was applied on the account.  Go over the recovery instructions the specialist provided, and let him know if you run into any issues.  They can continue assist with restoring access as well as any reparations.  Just reply to your ticket when you can!

I cannot login to the account, so I can't look at the support ticket to see what the specialist is saying. I had full access just yesterday and was waiting for a reply to the ticket I sent in, and this morning I cannot log in to the account on the league website or support website, though the email associated with the account is still my email, so I didn't get hacked.

It's possible that the account may still not be secure then, and may need to update your information like the email being used.  I let your Specialist know the situation, but you may need to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in this case since logging in to see the ticket is not an option.  This form doesn't require a login.  Alternatively, you can also email us to support@riotgames.com.  Hang tight until then!

So it's been nearly 24 hours since I sent in both a direct email and filled out an account recovery form. No replies to either. I'm trying really hard to stay positive about this, but frankly I'm getting frustrated at how long this is taking. I just want my account back.

bump,it's been over 24 hours since I sent in both a direct email and filled out an account recovery form. No replies to either. I'm trying really hard to stay positive about this, but frankly I'm getting frustrated at how long this is taking. I just want my account back.
contact the riot support asap. looks like someone got control over your account and tryes to transfer it to a different server
